All Classes

Class Description
AlreadyInsidePlayerException
This exception is raised when an attempt to add a Player to a full Match is made.
Apollo
This class implements the Apollo strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
Artemis
This class implements the Artemis strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
Athena
This class implements the Athena strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
Atlas
This class implements the Atlas strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
AtlasGuiStrategy
This class is the Strategy-pattern application of the interface GodGuiDrawer for Atlas.
AtlasListener
This class is a listener used for Atlas.
BadCommandException
This exception is raised the user types a malformed command in CLI.
BlockType
BlockType is the enumeration for the type of a block.
Board
Board is the class that keeps information about the "Island Board" (mentioned in game rules).
BoardDelegate
BoardDelegate is a class in which board activities are managed.
BoardScreen
BoardScreen is a class in which the GUI-component of the board game is generated.
BoardUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time the Match Board changes (for example, after a move/build, or after a Player lost)
BuildButtonListener
This class is the listener of the BuildButton which is constantly present in RealGame phase
CannotIncreaseLevelException
This exception is raised when a Worker tries to build to a Cell which is already at the Dome level.
Cell
This class contains information about the state of a single cell.
CellNotEmptyException
This exception is raised when an action on a Cell which is not empty is attempted.
Cli
Cli is the class in which interactions with users are managed.
CliApp
CLI main class, the class which starts the game in the command line.
Client
Client class handles all what is related to network for client-side.
ClientHandler
Runnable implementation which is instantiated every time a new client establishes a connection with the server.
CliPlayerHelper
This class is made to make Cli user-friendly, answering to every possible help request from users.
CliUpdateHandler
This class handles all the updates from server to different clients.
Command
Command is an abstract class extended by all sort of commands addressed to Controller by clients.
CommandHandler
CommandHandler is an interface thought to handle all commands received by Server.
CommandHandlerImpl
CommandHandlerImpl is thought to handle all commands received by Server.
CommandListener
This class implements the capability of listen asynchronously the client-server stream to catch Command objects sent from client to server.
CommandType
CommandType is the enumeration for the type of command a player can do.
ConnectionError
This class manages errors during connection to server phase.
ConnectionError.ConnectionErrorPanel
This is a private class used to create instances of a particular panel used to notify users that something went wrong during connection with server
Controller
This class represents the Controller in MVC design pattern.
Controller
This class represents Client's Controller in MVC design pattern.
CustomThreadPoolExecutor
Custom implementation of a ThreadPoolExecutor.
Demeter
This class implements the Demeter strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
DisconnectedPlayerUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time a Player disconnected.
EndTurnButtonListener
This class is the listener of the EndTurnButton which is constantly present in RealGame phase
Eros
This class implements the Eros strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
ErrorType
ErrorType is the enumeration representing the specific Error which just occurred (in case a command hasn't gone well).
ErrorUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time an error occurs.
Game
Game is an abstract class that partially manages the activities linked to GamePreparation and RealGame phases.
GameManual
GameManual is a class in which the GUI-component of the game manual is generated.
GameManualListener
This class is the listener of the GameManual GameManual button is in every game phase in order to let a player know in eah moment game rules and other info.
GamePhase
GamePhase is the enumeration for all match's phases.
GamePhaseCommandHandler
This class manages every possible interaction with user.
GamePhaseUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every the Game Phase changes.
GamePreparation
This class manages GamePreparation phase's commands.
GamePreparation
This class creates and manages GAME_PREPARATION phase layout.
GamePreparationCommand
GamePreparationCommand is the class that represents a Command specific for Game Preparation phase.
GodChoice
This class deals with CHOOSE_GODS game phase.
GodChoice
GodChoice is a class in which the GUI-component of the GamePreparation game phase is generated.
GodChoiceCommand
GodChoiceCommand is the class that represents a Command specific for God Choice phase.
GodChoiceInfoButtonListener
This class is the listener of the GodChoiceInfoButton.
GodChoiceJButtonListener
This class is the listener of a button which indicates a particular God during GodChoice game phase.
GodGuiDrawer
This interface defines a draw method through which classes that implement GodGuiInterface override to define a particular component for a specific God.
GodInfo
GodInfo is a class used to give players information about God.
GodInfoActionListener
This class is the listener of a button which indicates a player wants information about a specific God.
GodListener
This abstract class is a generic GodListener.
GodScreen
GodScreen is a class which manages the display of Gods during GodChoice gamePhase.
GodsGuiStrategy
This class is the Strategy-pattern application of the interface GodGuiDrawer for all Gods.
GodStrategy
This is the abstract class all the gods must extend in order to be playable in the game.
GodsUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time new Gods have been chosen (so the game state changed)
GodsUtils
Utility class which contains information about Gods and some static methods to handle them (for example, the God Factory Method).
Gui
Gui class represents Graphic User Interface part of the project.
GuiApp
GUI main class, the class which starts the game in the graphic environment.
GuiUpdateHandler
This class handles all the updates from server to different clients.
Hephaestus
This class implements the Hephaestus strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
Hera
This class implements the Hera strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
Hestia
This class implements the Hestia strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
InitialInfo
This class deals with INITIAL_INFO game phase.
InitialInfo
InitialInfo is a class in which the component during before and during nicknames and colors choice is managed.
InitialInfoCommand
InitialInfoCommand is the class that represents a Command specific for Initial Info phase.
InitialInfoUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time new initial info have been chosen (so the game state changed) (example: a Player chose its nickname and color)
InvalidCellException
This exception is raised when an action on a Cell which is not valid is attempted.
InvalidColorException
This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a PrintableColor which is not valid, because its String representation is not recognized, or because that PrintableColor has already been chosen.
InvalidGodException
This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a GodStrategy which is not valid or because that GodStrategy has already been chosen, or it's not selectable for this match.
InvalidPlayerNumberException
This exception is raised when a client sends an invalid player number in the initial phase of the connection.
JCellButton
This class defines a button which is used in RealGame phase.
JGodButton
This class defines a button which contains information about the God of a single player.
JRoundButton
This class defines a circular button.
LoadingComponent
This class defines a component which indicates a waiting for opponents to terminate their turns.
LoseUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time a Player loses.
LoseUpdate.LoseCause
Enum representing what made the Player lose, in this case a Player can lose if it can't move when its turn starts, or if it can't build after a move command.
Manual
This class defines a Game Manual.
Match
Match is the class that contains general information about current game, such as reference to players in it, the board (made up of cells where workers can move and build), ...
MatchEnded
This class deals with MATCH_ENDED game phase.
MatchLost
This class deals with MATCH_LOST game phase.
MatchStartedUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client when the match actually starts.
Minotaur
This class implements the Minotaur strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
Model
This class is a "proxy" between Controller and other components, such as the Match current state, and the RemoteView.
MoveButtonListener
This class is the listener of the MoveButton which is constantly present in RealGame phase
MultipleBuildDelegate
This class represent the delegate that Gods can use if their power provides the possibility to build more than one time each turn.
MultipleMovementDelegate
This class represent the delegate that Gods can use if their power provides the possibility to move more than one time each turn.
NicknameAlreadyTakenException
This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a nickname which is not valid because that nickname has already been chosen.
ObjectListener
Interface which is implemented by any component which needs to listen from Objects from a remote endpoint (on a stream).
ObjectListenerDelegate
This class is used as delegate (composition-over-inheritance) to share common code which would be otherwise duplicated.
Observable<T>
This class represents an observable object in MVC paradigm.
Observer<T>
This interface represents an observer, typical of MVC paradigm.
OpponentWorkerMoverDelegate
This class represent the delegate that Gods can use if their power provides the possibility to move an opponent Worker.
OtherInfoHandler
This class manages changes in a single match.
Pan
This class implements the Pan strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
PingSender
This class implements a Ping-message sender form Client to Server.
PlaceWorkersButtonListener
This class is the listener of the PlaceWorkersButton.
Player
This class contains information about Players who are playing a match, including a unique ID, nickname, the color of the chosen workers, a reference to two different workers the player can play with, a reference to the God associated to the player, the match in which the player is involved in and a boolean that indicates it the player is who chooses the Gods in play.
PlayerCommand
In this class there are references to the player who is playing the current turn during the Real Game phase, the type of Command requested by the player, the worker he/she wants to move or build with and the cell in which the player wants to move or build in.
PlayerNumberChoice
PlayerNumberChoice is a class in which the first Gui-component of the game is defined.
PlayerNumberChoiceRadioButtonListener
This class is the listener of the PlayerNumberChoice.
Poseidon
This class implements the Poseidon strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
PreviousCellNeededDelegate
This class represent the delegate that Gods can use if their power needs to save any previous position of a Worker.
PrintableColor
This enum represent a color that the Player can choose in the Initial Info GamePhase.
Prometheus
This class implements the Prometheus strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
QuitButtonListener
This class is the listener of the QuitButton available in several components in gui.
RealGame
This class manages REAL_GAME phase's commands.
RealGame
This class creates and manages REAL_GAME phase layout.
RemoteView
This class is used as link between Server and View.
Server
Server class handles all what is related to network for server-side.
ServerApp
Server main class, the class which starts the backend of the game in the command line.
ServerUnreachableUpdate
This class represents an update sent generated locally by the client to notify the view that the Server is not reachable.
TurnUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client every time the current turn changes.
UnknownGodException
This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a GodStrategy which is not valid or because that GodStrategy has a String representation which cannot be recognized as valid.
Update
This abstract class represents a message exchanged between Client and Server.
UpdateHandler
This abstract class contains the signature to force the concrete UpdateHandler to implement the methods to handle all possible updates that can be received by the View from the Server, by using a Visitor Pattern.
UpdateListener
This class implements the capability of listen asynchronously the client-server stream to catch Update objects sent from server to client.
View
This abstract class defines general methods which are used both in Cli and Gui related to the experience of users in game.
WaitingForAMatch
This class manages all the messages to print when a player waits for others to arrive.
WaitingForAMatch
This class defines a waiting component.
WinUpdate
This class represents an update sent from Server to Client when a Player wins the match.
Worker
This class contains information about the state of a single worker.
WrongGamePhaseException
This exception is raised the a client sends a Command which is not performable in the current GamePhase of this match.
WrongPlayerException
This exception is raised the a Player sends a Command when it's not its turn.
Zeus
This class implements the Zeus strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God.
ZeusGuiStrategy
This class is the Strategy-pattern application of the interface GodGuiDrawer for Zeus.
ZeusListener
This class is a listener used for Zeus.
